calDav.title: CalDAV Calendar
calDav.description:
Caldav is a protocol that allows different clients/servers to access scheduling information on remote servers as well as schedule meetings with other users on the same server or other servers.
It extends WebDAV specification and uses iCalendar format for the data.

toast.failed_to_fetch_calendars_description: Failed to fetch calendars from {serverUrl}. Please check if the server URL is correct and if the server is reachable.

s3AssetsStorage.title: S3 Assets Storage
s3AssetsStorage.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) is a service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS) that provides object storage through a web service interface. Also supports any S3 Compatible Storage - a storage solution that allows access to and management of the data it stores over an S3 compliant interface.

endpoint.label: S3 endpoint
endpoint.tooltip: Optional. Provide the endpoint URL if you are using non-AWS S3 compatible storage

bucket.label: S3 bucket
bucket.tooltip: Optional. Provide name of the S3 bucket. Default: assets

forcePathStyle.label: Force path style
forcePathStyle.tooltip: Select this option if your S3 provider requires the path style for objects.

statusText.error_checking_file_exists: Error checking if file exists in S3

fileSystemAssetsStorage.title: File system assets storage
fileSystemAssetsStorage.description: Store assets in the file system.

statusText.error_processing_configuration: Error processing file system assets storage configuration

googleCalendar.title: Google Calendar
googleCalendar.description: Google Calendar is a time management and scheduling service developed by Google. Allows users to create and edit events, with options available for type and time. Available to anyone that has a Gmail account on both mobile and web versions.

selectCalendar.label: Select calendar
selectCalendar.tooltip: Choose which Google Calendar to use for your appointments

outlook.title: Outlook
outlook.description: Microsoft Office 365 is a suite of apps that helps you stay connected with others and get things done. It includes but is not limited to Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Teams, OneNote and OneDrive. Office 365 allows you to work remotely with others on a team and collaborate in an online environment. Both web versions and desktop/mobile applications are available.

smtp.title: SMTP
smtp.description: SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) is an internet standard for email supported by most email processing servers. Connect to SMTP to send email.

email.label: Sender email
email.tooltip: Email address from which all emails will be sent

authUser.label: SMTP authentication user
authUser.tooltip: Username to log in into SMTP server

authPass.label: SMTP authentication password
authPass.tooltip: Password to log in into SMTP server

textBelt.title: TextBelt SMS
textBelt.description: Textbelt is a no-nonsense SMS API built for developers who just want to send SMS. Thousands of customers prefer Textbelt over other SMS providers for our ease of setup, simple, predictable pricing packages, and personal support

textMessageResponderAppId.label: Fallback text message responder
textMessageResponderAppId.tooltip: If not handled by sender, it will be used as default app to respond to text messages (i.e. auto reply). Optional

statusText.invalid_responder_app: Provided app does not exist or does not support responding to text messages

statusText.failed_to_get_quota: Failed to get remaining quota or quota is zero

weeklySchedule.title: Weekly schedule
weeklySchedule.description: Weekly schedule app allows users to create their working schedule for each individual week

reset.title: Are you absolutely sure?
reset.description: This action cannot be undone. This will reset the schedule for the week of {week} to the default one.
reset.success: Weekly schedule for the week of {week} was successfully reset to the default

resetAll.title: Are you absolutely sure?
resetAll.description: This action cannot be undone. This will reset all schedules from the week of {week} to the default one.
resetAll.success: All schedules from the week of {week} were successfully reset to the default

copy.title: Copy schedule
copy.description: Copy the schedule from the week of {week} to another week.

repeat.title: Repeat schedule
repeat.description: Copy this weekly schedule with interval
repeat.success: Schedule for week of {week} was successfully copied for every {interval}-nd week until {maxWeek}
repeat.repeatUntilTooltip: The latest week (including) up to which to repeat the schedule
repeat.replaceExistingDescription: If checked, this will replace existing schedules for weeks that fall into the repeated weeks
repeat.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will repeat the schedule for the week {week} ever {interval} weeks until the week of {maxWeek}.
